name: Triple-Headed Behemoth
effectText: If a face-up card(s) you control is destroyed by card effect, even during the Damage Step: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 WIND monster from your GY during the End Phase of this turn, but its ATK/DEF become 1000. You can only use this effect of "Triple-Headed Behemoth" once per Duel, and its previous effect only once per turn.
